name: Dice Kingdom
additional_notices: No active trades are found for this coin. Please submit a ticket at %{link} if you think this is an error.
The smart-contract owner can mint new tokens, please proceed with caution.

description.en:
Dice Kingdom is a board GameFi that has players roll the dice and get the block events.Real-time Chain Card lets player compete with friends they are connected with Blockchain.

The game features straightforward win/loss rules. To play until the conclusion of the turn. The player with the most money wins.
you can play with your friend and play with other player up to 3 player. Roll the dice and use card to libel other play .Inadditional,in game have different event of box and different Character and skill that more variety in game.

DK Token can be use for governence token.
๊Use for Cloning to increase the character.
๊Use for Absorb to make the character be better.
Use for Gashapon to open wear items or items that will character level up.
